messages.subject: Re: Putting bikes away
messages.msgSnippet: Yes, Ulrike, it is fun!  And, it is helping me to be a much better parent and listen to my heart (instincts) than to my head and all the authoritarian stuff.
messages.messageBody:
Yes, Ulrike, it is fun! And, it is helping me to be a much better parent and listen to my heart (instincts) than to my head and all the authoritarian stuff.

Amy C.

1a.

Re: putting bikes away - advice welcome!

Posted by: "Ulrike haupt" rica@... ulrikehaupt

Sun May 9, 2010 5:00 pm (PDT)



Amy

Isn't this fun? You come with a 'real life valid behavioral issue' and
within a day or so you come to understand that you were right all along
though did not know how right you were in knowing it was not the behaviour
but the circumsances. You did not want to nag your kids but did not see how
to get out of nagging mode and after only a couple of posts you already saw
the 'real' issue. Don't you just love this list?

Blissings

Ulrike

from Namibia - somewhere in Africa







[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
